name: WhatsApp Wedding Organizer
description: Add a WhatsApp button that connects couples directly to your wedding planning services. Perfect for wedding planners, organizers, and vendors looking to provide personalized consultation and event coordination through WhatsApp!

settings.content:
💍 Welcome to [Your Wedding Planning Business] 💝

Congratulations on your engagement! Let us help make your dream wedding a reality.

✨ OUR WEDDING PACKAGES:

👰 Classic Elegance
• Full wedding planning & coordination
• Venue selection assistance
• Vendor management
• Timeline planning

🌟 Premium Romance
• All Classic features +
• Custom design & styling
• Premium vendor network
• Guest experience management

💎 Luxury Celebration
• All Premium features +
• Destination wedding planning
• VIP concierge service
• Exclusive vendor access

💫 WHY CHOOSE US?
✅ Experienced Planners - 100+ weddings organized
✅ Stress-Free Planning - We handle every detail
✅ Vendor Network - Best rates from trusted partners
✅ Personal Touch - Your vision, our expertise

📍 CONTACT DETAILS:
📞 WhatsApp: [Your Number]
🌐 Website: [Your Website]
📸 Instagram: @[Your Handle]
📧 Email: [Your Email]

🎉 SPECIAL OFFERS:
• Free initial consultation
• Early bird discounts
• Seasonal packages
• Referral rewards

📅 Ready to start planning?
1. Share your wedding date
2. Tell us your vision
3. Get a customized quote
4. Begin the journey!

Let's create your perfect wedding day! 💕
